I plan to continue to listen to diverse groups, reflect, and ensure it is the right thing to do for self, family, state and country, said Salmon.`` I am not attached to the 2012 outcome, my odds, or my political career. At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy.
